ygData.subject: Re: Telescope Lens Quest (Spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya all, Eh?  Did I miss something?  We ALWAYS knew what you would get for completing the quest (the guy tells ya right when ya start it s a lvl 8 spell).  We
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya all,

Eh? Did I miss something? We ALWAYS knew what you would get for completing
the quest (the guy tells ya right when ya start it's a lvl 8 spell). We
were just hoping that you would get a 2nd quest that would have more to do
with the Eldritch Collective. Which you don't. I have a feeling that the
quest wasn't fixed for us at all, but simply was one of the messed up quests
that was fixed. Alas, you cannot move your skill up at all. Has anyone
moved their skill up since the "trades" patch? I spent 400p making lanterns
and not one skill increase...still at below average in tinkering...=(

Xalastile
Lvl 22 Magician
Xegony


----- Original Message -----
From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 12:39 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Telescope Lens Quest (Spoiler)
